Hero.title: Geodata Engineer &
Hero.description: Delivering data-driven insights for real estate investment decisions across European markets. Specializing in machine learning, geospatial analysis, and alternative data solutions for REITs and funds.

About.expertiseSubtitle: Specialized skills and technologies for enterprise-grade geospatial solutions.
About.educationSubtitle: Strong foundation in AI, data science, and business analytics from top European institutions.
About.experienceSubtitle: 4+ years delivering data-driven insights for real estate investment across European markets.

expertise.title: Machine Learning
expertise.description: Developing predictive models for real estate valuation, rent prediction, flood risk assessment (90%+ accuracy), and market forecasting using models, such as SAM, LVMs and Ensemble Methods.

expertise.title: Data Engineering and System Maintenance
expertise.description: Building robust data pipelines to process alternative data sources for European REITs, funds, and institutional investors, ranging from geodata to unstructured scrape data, using a distributed and dockerized Airflow system.

expertise.title: Geospatial Analysis and Spatial Econometrics
expertise.description: Advanced spatial analytics including agent-based modeling for gentrification prediction, computer vision on street-level imagery and spatially significant data science such as downsampling, yielding statistically robust results.

expertise.title: Scraping and Data Mining
expertise.description: Collecting and extracting insights from unstructured data, using cutting-edge tools, such as Captcha Solvers, Proxy Rotation and Selenium. I have done this for high frequency scraping, multi-year projects extracting 20+ million records.

experience.description: Leading data strategy and AI initiatives for alternative data FinTech serving European real estate funds, assets, and REITs. Working on the rollout of a project aggregating, homogenising and visualising intracity data from world cities.

Delivered data-driven insights for real estate investment decisions. Built ML models for property valuation and market analysis across 15+ European markets, working on projects for leading real estate companies, pension funds and for Eurostat.

Thesis on predicting flooding occurrences in Europe using alternative data and ML models, achieving 90%+ accuracy in risk classification and working on smaller items, preparing, aggregating and visualising data.
Part-Time Full Stack Developer maintaining enterprise-grade digital declaration software, working with web technologies such as EmberJS, PHP and sensitive customer data, using CI/CD and testing.

education.description: Thesis: Building an Agent-Based Model to Explain Gentrification in European Cities (Grade: 8/8)
Focus on machine learning, NLP, and computational methods for data analysis.

Contact.name: Ian Ronk
Contact.roleTitle: Head of Data | Real Estate AI & Analytics
Contact.bio: Based in Amsterdam, I lead data initiatives at KR&A, delivering AI-powered insights for European real estate funds, REITs, and institutional investors. With expertise in machine learning, geospatial analysis, and alternative data, I help transform complex data into investment decisions.
Contact.yearsExperience: 4+ years in Real Estate Data Science
